lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart was fined $25,000 and docked 25 championship points by Nascar yesterday for using what Nascar called inappropriate language during an interview with ESPN after he won the Allstate 400 on Sunday in Indianapolis. Stewart held on to fifth place in the series standings but was 17 points ahead of Carl Edwards instead of 42.
